decisions.name: New_Client_Status_is_Internal_External_Discussions
decisions.label: New Client Status is Internal External Discussions

Flow.description:
Allow EA user to do 'Client Fitment and Evaluation' when logged-in as Partner.
Removed the duplicate artifacts for retrieving the meeting events and all the subsequent steps. Simplified Decision Tree to Use Default Outcome and removed existing redundancies. Removed the Previous button from the last screen. Added validation for Start and End timings of meetings in the future. Modified the placement of the Attendees along with Start and End Time.
Flow.interviewLabel: Update New Client Flow On Internal / External Discussions {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Update New Client Flow On Internal / External Discussions

Your request has been successfully processed and the following fields have been updated:

  • Actual End Date Time | {!EndTime_0}

Minutes of Meeting

﻿The purpose is to track key outcomes and devise the future roadmap basis feedback received from each client engagement
